meanings.sent1: Ichthyologists observe fish behavior in their natural habitats.
meanings.sent2: Many ichthyologists work at aquariums to learn more about different fish species.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyologists were so focused on fish that they even dreamt of swimming with them!
meanings.sent4: The ichthyologists' dedication to fish research is as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an ichthyologist requires a deep love for all things aquatic.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the scientific study of fish.
meanings.sent1: Ichthyologists use advanced equipment to analyze fish DNA.
meanings.sent2: The conference was filled with ichthyologists sharing their latest research findings.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyologists' lab was so full of fish specimens, it looked like an underwater museum!
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, ichthyologists are the unsung heroes of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The ichthyologists' passion for fish is contagious among their colleagues.
